SELECT focus_info.*, user_info.`code`, user_info.`name`, user_info.images, ui2.`code` AS collectCode, ui2.`name` AS collectUser, ui2.images AS collectImages FROM focus_info LEFT JOIN user_info ON ( user_info.id = focus_info.user_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = focus_info.collect_user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui2.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{focusInfo.collectUser},'%')
AND user_info.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{focusInfo.userName},'%')
ORDER BY focus_info.create_date DESC
